pullrequest.title: Save models' material and meshes when logging targeting gazebo7

content.html:
@scpeters pointed out that this PR broke the homebrew build:

/Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-gazebo7-homebrew-amd64/gazebo/gazebo/util/LogRecord.cc:679:23: error: invalid operands to binary expression ('boost::system::error_code' and 'int')
        if (errorCode != 0 || !gazebo::common::copyDir(srcPath, destPath))
            ~~~~~~~~~ ^  ~
/Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-gazebo7-homebrew-amd64/gazebo/gazebo/util/LogRecord.cc:695:23: error: invalid operands to binary expression ('boost::system::error_code' and 'int')
        if (errorCode == 0)
            ~~~~~~~~~ ^  ~
